name: GetHexSpeciesContext
description: Top species, threatened and invasive lists for an H3 cell. Use to understand which species are present.

name: GetOSMContext
description: OSM-derived features for an H3 cell: roads, buildings, protected areas, ports, airports.

name: GetInfoAboutThreatenedSpecies
description: IUCN Red List info for threatened species. Provide h3_id+h3_res to get threatened from hex, or species_ids_or_names to look up specific species.

h3_id.description: H3 cell index (to get threatened species from hex)

species_ids_or_names.description: List of species IDs or scientific names
